amendment.description: To require the Secretary of Labor to provide technical and managerial assistance to the Secretary of Energy to carry out claims-related activities under the Energy Employees Occupational Illness Compensation Program Act 2000.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1719 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1719 proposed by Senator Domenici for Senator Grassley. (consideration: CR S11539-11544; text: CR S11542) To require the Secretary of Labor to provide technical and managerial assistance to the Secretary of Energy to carry out claims-related activities under the Energy Employees Occupational Illness Compensation Program Act 2000.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1719 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1719 proposed by Senator Domenici for Senator Grassley.
